name: Expander
description: Expand and reach for the stars! Float into infinity! Don't crash into walls. Expander is a fast-paced reaction game that challenges you to take risks. Collect precious stars by lifting and stretching your colored block. Shrink it to avoid obstacles. Stay calm and be prepared for mind-boggling twists.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: SM3 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: It does not take long to get into Expander but mastering it is the fun tricky part!  The aim of the game is to collect all the shiny stars by manipulating the size and height of the central block. This is done by left or right mouse clicks, plus moving the mouse up or down. It's tricky to get used to but it'll soon be intuitive to you.  The music is great and I love the way the screen twists around while you are moving through the 'corridor'.  Nice work!
